14:30-16:00.title: Oral Session 2B: 3D Scene Understanding
14:30-16:00.reason: Includes cutting-edge work on registration and feature learning in 3D scenes, relevant to 'registration' and '3d'

16:00-18:00.title: Poster Session 2: Deep Learning for 3D Geometry
16:00-18:00.reason: Features multiple papers on self-supervised 3D geometry processing, strongly related to the research interests

09:00-10:30.reason: Core session on self-supervised learning, including applications to 3D data, directly matching the keywords

13:00-15:00.reason: Comprehensive tutorial on self-supervised learning, providing foundational knowledge applicable to 3D problems

09:00-10:30.title: Oral Session 4A: 3D Deep Learning

10:30-12:00.title: Poster Session 4: Neural Representations for 3D
